Title: Requires e-mail service providers to implement a procedure to authenticate an individual's identity when such individual creates an e-mail account
Summary: Requires e-mail service providers to implement a procedure to authenticate an individual's identity when such individual creates a new e-mail account.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring e-mail service providers to implement a procedure to authenticate an individual's identity when such individual creates an e-mail account
